Title: Relates to imposing liability on owners of motor vehicles for failure to comply with vehicle sound limits
Summary: Imposes liability on owners of motor vehicles for failure to comply with vehicle sound limits in the city of New York.
LawCode: Add ยง24-236.1, NYC Ad Cd; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing liability on owners of motor vehicles for failure to comply with vehicle sound limits; to amend the public officers law, in relation to access to certain agency records; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
